title: Broken Arrow
content: Broken Arrow has two variations, with arrow heads, and without. Tell me what you think... ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106045018im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/7557.jpg)
author: zajacb

comments.content: I need some help... I have imported my font into fontographer as two seperate font files. I have the font without the arrows kerned and spaced correctly. Now I am trying to import the kerning and spacing information from the font without arrows into the font without arrows, but it is not working. Can anyone give me a step by step break down of the process???? Thanks!

Briana --   
   
Export Metrics from the kerned font, and import those metrics into the unkerned font. Good luck and keep creating fonts!   
   
John
